backend/main.mo: Minimal actor with no state or game logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to associated frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing various frontend files and their functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark color tokens and core styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app layout with timer tabs, background/music providers, settings sheet, and publish/share UI.
frontend/src/features/alerts/TimerAlertS: Settings card allowing users to enable or disable timer completion alerts.
frontend/src/features/alerts/TimerAlerts: Context provider managing alert settings, persistence, and completion notifications with sound.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/Backgr: UI for selecting and configuring image, video, or YouTube backgrounds with brightness and volume controls.
Context wrapper for background state with cleanup of blob URLs and access to useBackground logic.
Renders image, video, or YouTube backgrounds with brightness control and error handling, clearing backgrounds on failures. Manages media loading, playback errors, and YouTube-specific issues.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/loadYo: Loads the YouTube IFrame API once and exposes a promise that resolves when ready. Defines TypeScript types for the YT player interface.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/mediaS: Provides media-type inference, URL validation, probing utilities for images and videos, and user-friendly error messages. Includes helpers to extract file extensions and determine supported formats.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/useBac: Manages background state, persistence, and validation for images, videos, and YouTube links. Loads stored configuration, probes media, and exposes background settings and errors.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/YouTub: Initializes and sizes a YouTube IFrame player for background playback, handling autoplay restrictions and player errors. Rebuilds the player on load and tracks readiness and interaction issues.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/youtub: Extracts YouTube video IDs from multiple URL formats and builds embed URLs with background-friendly parameters. Returns errors for invalid or unsupported YouTube links.
frontend/src/features/music/MusicProvide: Provides music playback context using useMusic, exposing source info, volume, errors, and controls. Wraps children in a context provider for global music state.
frontend/src/features/music/MusicSetting: UI for setting music source URLs, adjusting volume, and displaying current music state with error handling.
frontend/src/features/music/MusicStage.t: Renders hidden audio or embed players and manages playback, loading, and errors based on music source type.
frontend/src/features/music/musicSupport: Parses URLs to classify Spotify, Apple Music, or direct-audio links and returns embed URLs or errors.
frontend/src/features/music/useMusic.ts: Hook managing music state, persistence, parsing, playback errors, and volume with localStorage support.
frontend/src/features/publishShare/Publi: Bottom sheet UI to copy or open the current URL and show preview warnings with publishing guidance.
frontend/src/features/publishShare/useIs: Hook detecting whether the app is running inside an iframe for preview mode checks.
frontend/src/features/reminders/Reminder: UI for viewing, adding, editing, and sorting reminders using dialog-based forms.
frontend/src/features/reminders/useRemin: Hook providing CRUD operations for reminders stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/features/timers/countdown/C: UI component for a customizable countdown timer with start, pause, reset, and duration inputs.
frontend/src/features/timers/countdown/u: Hook managing countdown logic, persistence, and interval updates with start, pause, and reset.
frontend/src/features/timers/interval/In: UI for alternating interval timer rounds with controls, settings inputs, progress display, and cycle alerts.
frontend/src/features/timers/interval/us: Hook controlling interval A/B timing cycles, round progression, persistence, and auto-switching behavior.
frontend/src/features/timers/pomodoro/Po: UI for Pomodoro timer with work/break segments, controls, segment indicators, and settings editing.
frontend/src/features/timers/pomodoro/us: Hook implementing Pomodoro segment timing, transitions, persistence, and completion tracking.
frontend/src/features/timers/repeating/R: UI component for a repeating countdown timer with controls, settings inputs, and completion notifications.
frontend/src/features/timers/repeating/u: Hook managing repeating timer logic, persistence, interval updates, and completion handling.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/Edit: Numeric text input that validates, clamps, and syncs values while supporting focus-based editing.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/Minu: Composite input splitting total seconds into minutes and seconds with clamping and change propagation.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/Rota: Interactive rotary dial control that converts drag-based rotation into bounded numeric values.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/time: Utility functions for formatting seconds and milliseconds into readable time strings.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/useA: Custom interval hook that runs callbacks reliably while reacting to updated dependencies.
frontend/src/features/timers/stopwatch/S: UI for a stopwatch with start, pause, reset, and lap recording plus lap list display.
frontend/src/features/timers/stopwatch/u: Hook implementing stopwatch timing, lap recording, and update intervals.
frontend/src/features/timers/visibility/: Bottom bar UI allowing toggling of timer visibility with show/hide button.
Hook managing timer visibility state with persistence, auto-hide logic, and user toggling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base and custom variables plus utility classes for theming, backgrounds, and custom UI components like a rotary dial.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins using CSS variables for dynamic theming.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, requirements, and feature requests for interval timer and publishing improvements.
